item.description:
Come to the The Shadow Room bar, bring friends, drink, dance, party, AND get to be a background extra as part of an indie comedy feature film, AND see me, Jason, behaving like a complete lunatic...again.

All you have to do is show-up, dress like you would any casual night out on the town, have fun, and ignore the cameras. You do not have to stay the whole night (probably ends 11-ish?). At some point the cameras are probably getting packed-away and then it's just a time for pure fun.

There should be some free food there (likely pizza). The alcohol is not free. Plenty of free street parking, or in nearby plazas (like the Destinta Theater plaza).

The producers are calling on lots of people, so we'll probably have a fair-sized crowd, my Event isn't the only avenue by which we're finding people.

WHY: This is being shot as part of a scene in an indie comedy feature film, in which one of the characters (Seppy) has been released from prison and his friends are all celebrating.

THE FILMING: It's "Burial Boys"
http://www.facebook.c...

There will be actors present from the film, in costume, in character, some odd, saying a few lines, and partying as well. Most likely they will only ever interact with you in-character.

If you're not anxious for attention, just ignore the weirdos and have fun. If you WANT to be caught on camera more, spend more time interacting with the strange folk.

AS FOR ME: I'll be one of the stranger characters there. My character (Kevin) is flamboyantly gay, and lascivious. I will have strange clothes, makeup, & hair, will be behaving like a lunatic, and will only interact with you in-character during the night (as long as the cameras are still out). Be frightened of me on the dance floor. Doubly-so if you're a man.
item.name: Mon. 6/21 - Drink, dance, party, free food, be in a film, see Jason be a lunatic
